meaningMnemonic: There's <radical>treasure</radical> in this <radical>tree</radical> so you take out your <radical>weapon</radical> and <kanji>kill</kanji> it.
readingMnemonic: But after the <kanji>kill</kanji>, <reading>Satsu</reading>ki (さつ) appears and yells at you. She likes trees — remember how she protected one in the 札 mnemonic? — so Satsuki's pretty upset you'd kill one like that.
